string.name: parent
string.value: Snow Silk and the Mysterious Fabric
Cassandra, maple world's informant, is said to have obtained some new information hot off the press. I'm curious what it is.
Cassandra told me about the Snow Silk. But for some reason she wouldn't explain in detail and kept telling me to just go see the archeologist, #bWinston#k...
Maple world's informant, Cassandra, notified me of her latest information, the Snow Silk. I went to go see Winston, the archaeologist who is looking for this Snow Silk.

Have you heard of the Snow Silk by any chance? Judging by your look, you don't have a clue, do you? You gotta get with the program... If you want to learn about #t4001166#, go see Winston, the archaeologist. According to rumors, he has been gathering information regarding Snow Silk.
Dr. Winston is said to be at the East Rocky Mountain in Perion. One can only wonder what he is doing in such a bleak and desolate place.
I guess sharing up-to-date information with you was pointless. I should warn you... With that kind of dull brain of yours, you'll go no where! You hear me? No where!
Did you come here for me? What can I do for you?\r\n#b#L0#I was hoping to learn about the Snow Silk.#l
Snow Silk? Oh~ you're talking about the Mysterious Fabric. That's right~ I was inquiring about the Snow Silk recently. Did you hear something about the Mysterious Fabric as well?
I already told you to go see Dr. Winston at the East Rocky Mountain in Perion. This is getting frustrating.
